original_text: They put worn and patched sandals on their feet and wore old clothes. All the bread of their food supply was dry and moldy.
korean_text: 그 발에는 낡아서 기운 신을 신고 낡은 옷을 입고 다 마르고 곰팡이가 난 떡을 준비하고

sentences.original_text: They put worn and patched sandals on their feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 낡고 기운 샌들을 발에 신었다

sentences.original_text: All the bread of their food supply was dry
